select project_progress,count(0) as projectCount from sop_project
group by project_progress
select count(0) as complete_count from sop_project

select
from_unixtime(created_time/1000,#{dateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as project_date,
from_unixtime(created_time/1000,'%Y-%m-%d') as project_date,
count(0) as project_count from sop_project
group by
from_unixtime(created_time/1000,#{dateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
from_unixtime(created_time/1000,'%Y-%m-%d')
order by project_date asc

select
from_unixtime(created_time/1000,#{dateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as project_date,
from_unixtime(created_time/1000,'%Y-%m-%d') as project_date,
count(0) as project_count, project_departId as department_id, project_type, create_uid from sop_project
group by
from_unixtime(created_time/1000,#{dateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),
from_unixtime(created_time/1000,'%Y-%m-%d'),
project_departId,project_type,create_uid order by project_date asc
limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select count(0) from ( select
from_unixtime(created_time/1000,#{dateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as project_date,
from_unixtime(created_time/1000,'%Y-%m-%d') as project_date,
project_departId as department_Id, project_type, create_uid, count(0) projectCount from sop_project
group by
from_unixtime(created_time/1000,#{dateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),
from_unixtime(created_time/1000,'%Y-%m-%d'),
project_departId, project_type, create_uid order by project_Date asc ) a

select ifnull(sum(project_valuations),0) as appraisement , ifnull(sum(project_contribution),0) as invest, from_unixtime(created_time/1000,'%Y-%m') as project_date from sop_project
group by from_unixtime(created_time/1000,'%Y-%m')
